long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notion Presentation" is a Google Chrome extension that converts Notion pages into a slideshow. By using this extension, you can use pages created in Notion as presentation materials as they are.

# Notion Presentation Features

You can display it like a slide by dividing it into blocks such as headers.
It also supports full-screen display, and you can switch slides with your mouse or keyboard.

- Create a slide show by dividing it with headers ğŸ˜ƒ
- Full-screen display with zoom in and out ğŸ”
- Switch slides with mouse or keyboard ğŸ–±ï¸âŒ¨ï¸
- All Notion blocks are available ğŸ“¦
- Editable while displaying the slide âœï¸
- Can present while keeping it private ğŸ”’
- 2-column, 3-column, and various layout options ğŸ“
- Settings for dividing blocks and hiding blocks ğŸ”§
